posts.name: Elaine
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.69 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • If you’ve disabled emoji stickers in your iOS keyboard settings, you’re no longer stuck continuing to see the sticker/memoji tabs in the iOS keyboard in Signal.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.68 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.69.0.888-beta

56 new commits since 7.68.0.881-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.69 [1]

  • Make Skip & Restore work on key entry screen. [2]

  • Add biometric auth to QuickRestore [3]

  • Asyncify 'find by number' in recipient picker [4]

  • Add completion to 'Contact Support' presenter [5]

  • Cleanup cancellation from key entry screen. [6]

  • Asyncify RegistrationSessionManager & RegistrationCoordinatorTests [7]

  • Asyncify ReusableMediaView [8]

  • Asyncify more of 'contact support' flow [9]

  • Add a bunch of file and folder sizes to internal settings [10]

  • Remove PNI Hello World [11]

  • Asyncify blockOnOutgoingVerification [12]

  • Asyncify initiateOutgoingPayment [13]

  • Asyncify tryToSendPayment [14]

  • Extract withTimeoutAndErrorConversion [15]

  • Asyncify submitTransaction [16]

  • Asyncify getOutgoingTransactionStatus [17]

  • Asyncify getAccountActivity [18]

  • Consolidate error handling/presentation for registration backup operations [19]

  • Ask for restore method on relaunch [20]

  • Remove LearnMyOwnPniManager [21]

  • Refetch pasteboard to work around green square [22]

  • Increase timeout when sending messages [23]

  • Use non-global remote config flag for usePqRatchet. [24]

  • Remove unused method from BackupRequestManager [25]

  • Rename lvalue that I missed in previous PR [26]

  • Update url path for svr chat server auth requests [27]

  • Add BackupCDNCache for read credentials, metadata [28]

  • Move disk space checks and orphan attachment check into InternalSettings sub-page [29]

  • Download offloaded attachments before disabling Backups [30]

  • Add a test for BackupDisablingManager [31]

  • Wipe cached Backup credentials when disabling Backups [32]

  • Rename BackupCDNCache -> BackupCDNCredentialStore [33]

  • Wait for list-media before disabling Backups [34]

  • Fix message input not respecting "stickers in emoji keyboard" setting [35]

  • Promote chats with drafts to the top of the Chat List [36]

  • Wrap all of Backup enabling in a modal, not just parts of it [37]

  • Fix concurrency test flake in BackupAttachmentUploadTrackerTest [38]

  • Remove handling for interacting with ancient error messages [39]

  • Allow for SVR/AEP mismatch during registration backup restore [40]

  • Backup key reminder megaphone snooze should actually save [41]

  • Add support for linking out to App Store [42]

  • Update to Swift Protobuf 1.3.0 [43]

  • Localize outgoing restore prompts [44]

  • Add BackupTestFlightEntitlementManager [45]

  • Add AppAttestManager to use AppAttest to acquire the Backup entitlement for TestFlight builds [46]

  • Clean up DarwinNotificationName & friends [47]

  • Update Pods [48]

  • Convert the remaining TSThread/updateWith... methods to Swift [49]

  • Fix URL path for fetching AppAttest assertion challenge [50]

  • Megaphone for inactive primary devices [51]

  • Move viewModel state updates while loading BackupSubscription into VC [52]

  • Add logging to AppAttestManager [53]

  • Rotate persisted AppAttest keyId [54]

  • Update release notes [55]

  • Update translations [56]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.68.0.881-beta…7.69.0.888-beta

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.70 release.
